name: Crunchyroll
overview: Adds metadata from crunchyroll to your anime collection and shows reviews and comments from users
description: Adds metadata from crunchyroll to your anime collection and shows reviews and comments from users

Bugixes: 
- fixed not finding series by name if folder name includes year and/or tvdbid (e.g. Sword Art Online (2008) [tvdbid-65567])
